coreAttributes.name: Black Blade
coreAttributes.description: A huge daemonic sword wielded only by the mightiest follower of Khorne.
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: Slash at [npc2.name] with your Black Blade.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] hold of the Black Blade. Blood for the blood God!

hitDescriptions.hitText: Gripping the blade with [npc.namePos] strength, [npc.name] [npc.verb(strike)] at [npc2.name], the blade pierces [npc2.herHim] with wrath.
Gripping the sword tightly, [npc.name] [npc.verb(slice)] [npc2.name] with rage and purpose.
Looking at [npc2.name], [npc.name] [npc.verb(take)] the Black Blade in one hand thightly and [npc.verb(strike)] down [npc2.name]!

missDescriptions.missText: Gripping the blade with [npc.namePos] strength, [npc.name] [npc.verb(strike)] at [npc2.name], the blade grazes [npc2.herHim] with wrath. [npc2.Name] [npc.verb(dodge)] the blade but barely.
Gripping the sword tightly, [npc.name] [npc.verb(slice)] [npc2.name] with fierce speed. Giving [npc2.herHim] a chance to avoid the menacing Black Blade.

Gazing upon [npc2.name], [npc.name] [npc.verb(take)] the Black Blade with one hand and [npc.verb(strike)] down [npc2.name]! This pride however, was enough to give [npc2.Name] a chance to escape death.
